attributes.action: Punish drink drivers by creating their worst nightmare.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Punish drink drivers - minimum 3 years imprisonment; unless a third party is hurt, where the minimum imprisonment would be 10 years. Any vehicles owned by the individual would be sold and all monies put into a national fund that would be used to help victims and their families. If the amount is less than £10,000 then the individual’s savings and/or property can be taken to the value, if this is still insufficient, then any money they earn after leaving prison would be docked by 25% until the debt is paid. The driver would also receive permanent loss of all driving licenses, they will never be allowed to own any motorized vehicle again and their I.D. would be published nationally.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
